import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { EmployeeService } from 'src/app/core/services/employee.service'; import { PresenceService } from 'src/app/core/services/presence.service'; import { Presence } from 'src/app/models/presencemodel'; @Component({ selector: 'app-presence-form', templateUrl: './presence-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./presence-form.component.css'] }) export class PresenceFormComponent implements OnInit { }
